experience: You and Tanbir both know Tammy Lower, Jeremy McElliott, and 7 others
Some people will search continuously for recognition from the others to feel good about themselves. When they don’t get it, they will be easily deceived and frustrated.

The ONLY thing you have to worry about is to become worthy of recognition. You don’t have to care about people as they should have their own worries. What you think about yourself is really what matters.
To become a person of value, it should start from INSIDE. Once attained, everyone will feel it and you won’t need people’s approval anymore.
Your OWN approval should be your priority. Everything else is secondary.
5 openings remaining, please email me at piyush.batra@talentburst.com

TalentBurst is a leading provider of contract Information Technology, Engineering, SaaS, Bio-Pharma, Accounting & Finance, Marketing, Utility and Compliance staffing and consulting solutions to over 50 Fortune 1000 corporations. We have branch locations in Boston, San Francisco, Miami, Houston, Milwaukee and international offices in Toronto, Canada, Gurgaon, India and Singapore.Through our PEO division we are a provider of high risk payroll and 1099 compliance solutions and currently support customers in US, Canada, UK, India and Singapore.

Responsible for full cycle recruiting - sourcing, screening, interviewing, negotiating & extending offers.Explored different sources of recruitment including Internet job boards, referrals, vendor relationship, and candidate pools.Maintaining and building the candidate relationship and developing the pipeline.Responsible for supporting high-volume staffing activities including sourcing, identifying the right candidate, pre-screening his overall technical skills, scheduling and coordinating the final interview process, negotiating the rate.Specialized in screening resumes with different areas of technology including JAVA, J2EE, Quality Analysis, ERP, .Net, Mainframe, Network and so on.Played a major role in meeting the deadlines on time for each and every open position.Introduced and implemented different hiring techniques which gave productive results.Well versed in coaching and giving the candidates pre interview tips.Placed candidates on different technical skill set including JAVA, .Net, SAP, Peoplesoft, Oracle DBA, Sybase DBA, QA, Network Engineer, Network Architect , Mainframe Testers, etc.Responsible for constant touch with the consultant even after they are placed in the project, to solve any of their issues and concerns.Responsible for filing consultant's timesheets every week with the Accounts Department.Documented and Circulated Minutes of Meeting.Responsible for training other junior recruiters and supporting their activities on a daily basis.
PBC SOFTWARE / Manpower Professional - Las Vegas

“The world leader in the employment services industry; creating and delivering services that enable its clients to win in the changing world of work. Manpower Professional has offices in 34 countries. The $21 billion company, with an approximately 400,000 clients worldwide, offers employers a range of services for the entire employment and business cycle including permanent, temporary and contract recruitment; employee assessment and selection; training; outplacement; outsourcing and consulting”.    Role:•	Responsible for full cycle recruiting - sourcing, screening, interviewing, negotiating & extending offers.•	Explored different sources of recruitment including Internet job boards, referrals, vendor relationship, and candidate pools.•	Maintaining and building the candidate relationship and developing the pipeline.•	Responsible for supporting high-volume staffing activities including sourcing, identifying the right candidate, pre-screening his overall technical skills, scheduling and coordinating the final interview process, negotiating the rate.•	Specialized in screening resumes with different areas of technology including JAVA, J2EE, Quality Analysis, ERP, .Net, Mainframe, Network and so on.•	Played a major role in meeting the deadlines on time for each and every open position.•	Introduced and implemented different hiring techniques which gave productive results.•	Well versed in coaching and giving the candidates pre interview tips.•	Placed candidates on different technical skill set including JAVA, .Net, SAP, Peoplesoft, Oracle DBA, Sybase DBA, QA, Network Engineer, Network Architect Mainframe Testers, etc.•	Responsible for constant touch with the consultant even after they are placed in the project, to solve any of their issues and concerns.•	Responsible for filing consultant's timesheets every week with the Accounts Department.•	Documented and Circulated Minutes of Meeting..

summary: Highly motivated, focused and energetic IT Recruiter with over seven years of experience in placing candidates with clients located all over US. Well rounded experience in full life cycle recruiting i.e., from Sourcing to closing.Well-organized problem solver with "Can do Will do approach". Possess excellent communication, presentation, interviewing and negotiation skills.  RECRUITING SKILLS:-Extensive experience providing full life cycle recruiting (Traditional Recruiting, Web based Recruiting), that includes: identification and sourcing of external talent, internal marketing of applicable candidate profiles, management of candidate expectations, and facilitation of the candidate's interview and offer processing. Used Traditional Recruiting Methods such as social networking, Employee Referrals, Cold calling, Advertising, and internal resume databasesExtensively used Internet job boards like Dice/Monster/Hot Jobs/ Career Builder by utilizing search techniques like keyword search, Area Search and Advance Boolean Search Strings. Also use various user groups like Google groups, Utilize local display sites like Craig's list and social networking sites like LinkedInNegotiated all offers and managed the offer approval process through final approval and paper work with the client .Often partnered with the hiring managers, senior management, and other groups as necessary.  	CONSULTANT MANAGEMENT SKILLS:Includes Salary Negotiations, Behavioral Interviews, Background Check, Drug Screen, Immigration Documentations and legal compliance, Employee Induction and New Hire Orientation. Excellent knowledge of Various Visa Categories, Immigration Policies and Procedures related to H1b, H4, L1, L2, B1, B2, J1, J2 Visas and Green Card Processing.
